name: Sweet & Spicy Asian Fish
ingredients: 1 tablespoon granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda
1/2 teaspoon sambal oeleck, or to taste

instructions.en: In a small bowl, mix all of the ingredients except the fish.
Place the fish in a gallon size zipper bag and pour in the sauce.
Seal the bag and then gently knead the fish until it's completely coated with sauce.
If time allows, marinate the fish in the bag for at least an hour.
Dump the fish and sauce onto a rimmed baking sheet lined with foil and arrange the fish in a single layer.
Raise the oven rack to the highest setting and broil the fish for another 5 minutes.

notes: Sambal oeleck is an Asian chili paste. The recipe makes 3 servings. Marinating time is optional but recommended for at least an hour if time allows.
